RuntimeErrorResolution.Summary: OSGi bundle missing constraint in Equinox
RuntimeErrorResolution.SampleLogOutput: org.osgi.framework.BundleException: The bundle could not be resolved. Reason: Missing Constraint: Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: J2SE-1.5 at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleHost.startWorker(BundleHost.java:294) at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.AbstractBundle.start(AbstractBundle.java:256)
RuntimeErrorResolution.RegExpPattern: org.osgi.framework.BundleException: The bundle could not be resolved. Reason: Missing Constraint: (.*) at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleHost.startWorker\(BundleHost.java:294\) at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.AbstractBundle.start\(AbstractBundle.java:256\)
RuntimeErrorResolution.ProblemDetailHtml: One of the deployed bundles has a missing constraint: $1
RuntimeErrorResolution.SolutionDetailHtml: Change your bundle manifest or update the running OSGi environment
